fields.initialValue: Founded in 2008, Cuddles Preschool has evolved into a trusted space for early learning, where happy, confident, and independent children thrive. Over the years, we've nurtured hundreds of little learners and witnessed their incredible journeys—each child's growth is a story that continues to inspire us.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Hero Description

fields.initialValue: We envision a future where early childhood is honoured as the most powerful stage of learning. At Cuddles, we strive to redefine preschool education by creating environments where curiosity is cherished, imagination is nurtured, and the joy of learning lasts a lifetime.
fields.name: vision
fields.title: Vision Text

fields.initialValue: Our mission is to nurture young minds through playful, purposeful learning that builds strong foundations for life. We aim to create a joyful environment where every child feels safe, supported, and inspired to grow with confidence and creativity.
fields.name: mission
fields.title: Mission Text

initialValue.question: What age groups do you accept?
initialValue.answer: We take kids of 3 months and onwards.

initialValue.question: In what ways can learning via play help children perform better in school?
initialValue.answer: Learning through play helps children develop critical thinking skills, creativity, and social abilities. It makes learning enjoyable and memorable, leading to better retention and academic performance.

initialValue.question: What security steps do you take, and how do you let parents know?
initialValue.answer: We maintain strict security protocols including background checks for all staff, secure entry systems, regular safety drills, and real-time communication with parents through our app and daily reports.

initialValue.question: Are parents updated and involved in school happenings?
initialValue.answer: Yes! We provide daily updates through our parent app, regular newsletters, parent-teacher conferences, and special events. We believe in maintaining open communication with families.

fields.initialValue: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our programs or want to schedule a visit, our team is here to help.
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

fields.initialValue: Your Child's Bright Future Starts Here!
fields.name: formTitle

fields.initialValue: Plant the roots of lifelong learning with Cuddles! Visit us and discover how bright beginnings shape brighter futures
fields.name: description
fields.title: Footer Description

fields.initialValue: At Cuddles Preschool, we believe that every child's journey begins with a sense of wonder, joy, and discovery. We are more than just a place for early education, we're a second home where children feel loved, valued, and inspired to explore the world around them.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Hero Description

fields.description: Upload hero background image (current: hero-bg CSS class)
fields.name: backgroundImage

fields.initialValue: The first five years of a child's life are when 90% of brain development occurs. Active learning and creative experiences don't just teach skills but they build the neural pathways that determine how children think, learn, and approach challenges for life. At Cuddles, we harness this incredible potential through purposeful play, hands-on exploration, and creative expression.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Section Description

fields.initialValue: In this period of STEM learning and rushing milestones, we have designed our programs to celebrate children's journey toward learning and discovering their passion. Our curriculum is designed to grow with your child, gently and intentionally supporting their development at every stage.

fields.initialValue: Every day at Cuddles follows a rhythm designed to comfort, inspire, and engage. Here's what a typical day looks like
fields.name: description
fields.title: Section Description

fields.initialValue: Research-based approaches that make learning meaningful and joyful
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.title: Montessori Approach
initialValue.description: Child-led learning with specially designed materials that encourage independence, concentration, and a love for learning.

initialValue.title: STEM Integration
initialValue.description: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math concepts introduced through hands-on experiments and real-world problem solving.

initialValue.title: Creative Arts Integration
initialValue.description: Art, music, and creative expression woven throughout the curriculum to develop imagination and self-expression.

initialValue.title: Play-Based Learning
initialValue.description: Learning happens naturally through purposeful play, exploration, and hands-on experiences that spark curiosity.

fields.initialValue: Comprehensive curriculum covering all aspects of child development
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.title: Language & Literacy
initialValue.description: Building communication skills through storytelling, phonics, vocabulary development, and early reading and writing experiences.

initialValue.title: Mathematics & Logic
initialValue.description: Exploring numbers, patterns, shapes, and problem-solving through hands-on activities and real-world applications.

initialValue.title: Science & Discovery
initialValue.description: Encouraging curiosity about the natural world through experiments, observations, and hands-on exploration.

initialValue.title: Creative Arts & Music
initialValue.description: Developing creativity and self-expression through art, music, dance, and various creative mediums.

initialValue.title: Physical Development
initialValue.description: Building gross and fine motor skills through active play, sports, and coordination activities.

initialValue.title: Social-Emotional Learning
initialValue.description: Developing emotional intelligence, empathy, and social skills through group activities and mindful practices.

fields.initialValue: How we monitor and celebrate your child's development
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

fields.initialValue: We believe assessment should celebrate growth, not judge children. Our approach focuses on observing, documenting, and supporting each child's unique developmental journey.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Section Description

initialValue.title: Observational Assessment
initialValue.description: Teachers carefully observe children during their daily activities, documenting their progress, interests, and learning patterns in a natural environment.

initialValue.title: Portfolio Documentation
initialValue.description: We create individual portfolios showcasing each child's work, growth, and achievements over time, creating a beautiful record of their learning journey.

initialValue.title: Developmental Milestones
initialValue.description: Regular tracking of developmental milestones across all domains - physical, cognitive, social, and emotional - ensuring holistic growth.

initialValue.title: Parent Conferences
initialValue.description: Regular one-on-one meetings with parents to discuss their child's progress, share observations, and collaborate on supporting their development.

fields.initialValue: Thoughtfully designed spaces that inspire exploration and discovery
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

fields.initialValue: Every space at Cuddles is intentionally designed to support different types of learning and development, creating an environment where children feel safe, engaged, and inspired.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Section Description

initialValue.title: Montessori Classroom
initialValue.description: Carefully prepared environments with child-sized furniture and materials that promote independence, concentration, and self-directed learning.

initialValue.title: Creative Arts Studio
initialValue.description: A vibrant space dedicated to artistic expression, music, and creative exploration with various materials and instruments.

initialValue.title: Science Discovery Corner
initialValue.description: An engaging area for hands-on experiments, nature observation, and scientific exploration designed to spark curiosity.

initialValue.title: Outdoor Play Garden
initialValue.description: A natural outdoor environment with gardens, play structures, and open spaces for physical activity and nature connection.

initialValue.title: Reading Nook
initialValue.description: A cozy, quiet space filled with books and comfortable seating that encourages a love for reading and storytelling.

fields.initialValue: Working together to support your child's growth and development
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

fields.initialValue: We believe parents are a child's first teachers. Our partnership approach ensures consistency between home and school, creating the best possible learning environment for your child.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Section Description

initialValue.title: Daily Communication
initialValue.description: Regular, meaningful communication about your child's daily experiences, achievements, and areas of growth through various channels.

initialValue.title: Home-School Consistency
initialValue.description: Collaborating to ensure consistent approaches between home and school environments, supporting your child's routines and values.

initialValue.title: Parent Education & Resources
initialValue.description: Providing parents with resources, workshops, and guidance to support their child's development at home.

initialValue.title: Family Involvement
initialValue.description: Creating opportunities for families to participate in their child's learning journey and school community.

initialValue.title: Individual Support Plans
initialValue.description: Working together to create personalized approaches that meet each child's unique needs and support their optimal development.

fields.initialValue: Enriching experiences that make learning memorable and fun
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.title: Nature Explorers
initialValue.description: Weekly outdoor adventures that connect children with nature through guided exploration, garden work, and environmental discovery.

initialValue.title: Little Scientists
initialValue.description: Hands-on STEM activities that introduce scientific concepts through safe, age-appropriate experiments and discovery.

initialValue.title: Creative Expression
initialValue.description: A comprehensive arts program including visual arts, music, drama, and creative movement to develop artistic abilities.

initialValue.title: Young Entrepreneurs
initialValue.description: Introduction to basic economic concepts through play-based activities like classroom stores, trading, and simple business concepts.

initialValue.title: Cultural Celebrations
initialValue.description: Exploring different cultures, traditions, and celebrations from around the world to build global awareness and appreciation.

initialValue.title: Mindfulness & Yoga
initialValue.description: Daily practices that help children develop emotional regulation, body awareness, and peaceful focused attention.

fields.initialValue: Get answers to common questions about our curriculum and programs
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.question: What teaching methodologies do you use?
initialValue.answer: We use a combination of Montessori approach, STEM integration, creative arts, and play-based learning. Our curriculum is research-based and designed to support holistic child development through hands-on, child-led activities.

initialValue.question: How do you assess my child's progress?
initialValue.answer: We use observational assessment, portfolio documentation, developmental milestone tracking, and regular parent conferences. Our approach celebrates growth rather than judging children, focusing on each child's unique developmental journey.

initialValue.question: What age groups do your programs serve?
initialValue.answer: We serve children from 3 months to 6 years across six programs: Infants (3+ months), Toddler (1-2 years), Play Group (2-3 years), Nursery (3-4 years), Prep-1 (4-5 years), and Prep-2 (5-6 years). Each program is tailored to specific developmental needs.

initialValue.question: How do you ensure a safe learning environment?
initialValue.answer: Our learning environments are thoughtfully designed with child-sized furniture, natural lighting, and safe materials. We maintain small class sizes, have qualified staff, and create spaces that promote independence while ensuring safety and supervision.

initialValue.question: How do you involve parents in their child's learning?
initialValue.answer: We believe in strong parent partnerships through daily communication, regular conferences, resource sharing, family involvement opportunities, and collaborative goal setting. Parents receive updates on their child's progress and activities to support learning at home.

initialValue.question: What makes your curriculum different from traditional preschools?
initialValue.answer: Our curriculum integrates multiple research-based approaches, emphasizes child-led learning, incorporates STEM and arts naturally, and focuses on developing the whole child. We celebrate the learning journey rather than rushing to meet arbitrary milestones.

initialValue.question: Do you offer special programs beyond regular curriculum?
initialValue.answer: Yes, we offer enriching programs like Nature Explorers, Little Scientists, Creative Expression, Cultural Celebrations, Young Entrepreneurs, and daily Mindfulness & Yoga. These programs make learning memorable and fun while developing various skills.

initialValue.question: How do you prepare children for elementary school?
initialValue.answer: Our Prep programs focus on school readiness through independence skills, social-emotional development, early literacy and numeracy, critical thinking, and confidence building. We ensure smooth transitions while maintaining our play-based, joyful approach to learning.

fields.initialValue: Collaborate with us to support your employees
fields.name: title
fields.title: Hero Title

fields.initialValue: At Cuddles, we understand the challenges working parents face. That's why we offer customised daycare solutions for corporate partners, ensuring that your employees' children receive the best care and education while they focus on their work.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Hero Description

initialValue.title: Discounted fees
initialValue.description: Special rates based on the number of enrollments.

initialValue.title: Customized Solutions
initialValue.description: Tailored programs to meet your employees' needs.

initialValue.title: Peace of Mind
initialValue.description: A safe, nurturing environment for your employees' children.

fields.initialValue: Whether you are an industry giant or an emerging enterprise, we work closely with you to offer your employees quality preschool and day-care services that truly support their work-life balance.
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

fields.initialValue: Every Day At Cuddles Follows A Rhythm Designed To Comfort, Inspire, And Engage. Here's What A Typical Day Looks Like
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.title: Preferential Access & Fee Benefits
initialValue.description: Corporate partners receive priority admissions and tailored fee structures, making our premium early education experience more accessible to their teams.

initialValue.title: Custom Childcare Solutions
initialValue.description: We offer flexible plans including full-time preschool, day-care support, emergency care, and on-demand parenting workshops to meet your team's evolving needs.

initialValue.title: Trusted Early Learning Approach
initialValue.description: Our play-based, process-driven curriculum fosters curiosity, creativity, and confidence. Children build lasting skills through experiences that go beyond academics — from emotional intelligence to collaborative thinking.

initialValue.title: Reliable Communication & Involvement
initialValue.description: From parent-teacher touchpoints to real-time updates, we keep families engaged every step of the way. You can trust that every child is cared for with intention and heart.

fields.initialValue: Getting Started Is Simple And Seamless.
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Section Subtitle

initialValue.step: Reach Out via the corporate inquiry form below
We Connect to understand your team's requirements
We Curate a custom enrollment and benefit structure
You Share Access to your employees
Children Enroll with priority placement and onboarding support

fields.initialValue: At Cuddles Preschool, safety is not just a policy. It is a part of how we care, teach, and grow. Under the leadership of our founder Chandrika Bharath, every measure is thoughtfully planned to support playful learning without compromising on protection. We create an environment where children can explore freely while being safe, healthy, and supported at every step.

fields.initialValue: We guide every transition with care
fields.name: title
fields.title: Hero Title

fields.initialValue: We make the shift to formal school environments a positive, well-supported experience for both children and parents. Every element of our program — academic, emotional, and social — helps children step into their next chapter with readiness and joy.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Hero Description

fields.initialValue: Here's how we support this transition:
fields.name: subtitle
fields.title: Hero Subtitle

initialValue.title: School Admission Guidance
initialValue.description: We offer personalised advice on selecting the right school and navigating the admission process with ease.

initialValue.title: Interview Readiness
initialValue.description: Through playful mock sessions, storytelling, and expression games, children develop the confidence to communicate clearly during school interviews.

initialValue.title: Primary School Prep Activities
initialValue.description: Age-appropriate worksheets, literacy and  numeracy boosters, and skill-building sessions bridge the gap between preschool and formal education.

fields.initialValue: Our connection with families grows stronger with time. For children graduating from our programs, we offer additional opportunities for continued growth and joyful exploration.
fields.name: description
